properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 21 at 9:03PM PST until January 22 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...
- Small Craft Advisory conditions tonight; southwest winds 15
to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas around 15 ft at 14
seconds.
- Gale conditions expected Wednesday; south winds 20 to 25 kt
with gusts up to 35 kt and seas around 15 ft at 13 seconds.
- Gale conditions possible Wednesday night and Thursday morning;
south winds 25 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and seas around
15 ft at 10 seconds.

* WHERE...Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60
NM.

* WHEN...
- Small Craft Advisory in effect until 7 AM Wednesday morning.
- Gale Warning in effect from 7 AM until 4 PM Wednesday.
- Gale Watch in effect Wednesday evening through Thursday
morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING
